skill_description.arcanearmaments.fireba: Throw an exploding ball of flame, igniting enemies caught in the blast.
skill_description.arcanearmaments.blink: Teleport yourself to a target location or entity.
skill_description.arcanearmaments.blizza: Throw a bolt of ice that shatters into a slowing, damaging storm.
skill_description.arcanearmaments.thunde: Call down a lightning strike after a short delay. Can be attached to a target or engraved into the ground.
skill_description.arcanearmaments.enveno: Inject your foe with a deadly venom, slowly draining their life.
skill_description.arcanearmaments.smoke_: Vanish in a puff of smoke. Become fully invisible to both players and mobs.
skill_description.arcanearmaments.ruptur: Strike at the heels, causing enemies to take damage as they flee.
skill_description.arcanearmaments.execut: Finish off a wounded opponent with less than a third of their health.
skill_description.arcanearmaments.berser: Gain movement speed and the ability to fight with two weapons, but take 25 percent more damage.
skill_description.arcanearmaments.stomp: Create a tremor that stuns nearby enemies. Activate midair to transfer fall damage from yourself to your foes.
skill_description.arcanearmaments.grappl: Throw a hooked chain to pull your enemies within the range of your axe.
skill_description.arcanearmaments.molten: Burn and knock enemies back while regenerating health.
skill_description.arcanearmaments.blesse: Grant yourself and nearby players the ability to steal life with every hit.
skill_description.arcanearmaments.holy_s: Negate damage from the next three attacks.
skill_description.arcanearmaments.smitin: Shoot a beam of light at a foe, turning their healing into damage for a short time.
skill_description.arcanearmaments.healin: Release steady waves of healing to mend the wounds of all nearby players.
death.attack.fireball.player: %2$s blew up %1$s in a fiery explosion
death.attack.blink.player: %1$s was punched into the void by %2$s
death.attack.venom.player: %1$s fell to the venomous blades of %2$s
death.attack.rupture: %1$s ran too fast and bled out
death.attack.rupture.player: %1$s bled to death from the precise strikes of %2$s
death.attack.smiting_ray.player: %1$s was banished to the nether by %2$s
